Title: Relates to requiring certain cabarets and public dance halls to install video surveillance cameras at all entrances and exits

LawCode: Add ยง399-hh, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring certain cabarets and public dance halls to install video surveillance cameras at all entrances and exits
